subject: Re: Portable Ghost Box System video
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi LC,

The mic is a "ListenUp" brand.  I got it at Radio Shack.  They had 
their own brand there too, but theirs was about $12 more.  I think 
they just started carrying the "ListenUp" brand.  I like the blue 
light effect too...
The earbuds came with the mic, but they are not amplifeid, just the 
mic is.

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Mike, one more question for you:
> 
> What's the brand of amplified mic you are using and does Radio 
SHack 
> have it, too?  It seems to be a bit better than the amplified lapel 
> mic I am using inside my echo chamber.  I am experimenting with two 
> mics, as when I added the splitter I couldn't get any audio out of 
it 
> like you do.  It must either be the mic you are using is better, or 
> the headphones/earbuds you use are amplified (??).
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> LC
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
> <michaelcoletta@> wrote:

> Ghost

the
